author: kief
msg: Applied Bip Thelin's <bip@razorfish.com> patch to allow Store
to be set from server.xml. Also added a check for the (default)
case where Store is not set.

author: kief
msg: Added configuration and documentation for PersistentManager,
which is commented out by default.

author: remm
msg: - Should fix bug 1202, at least when a naming operation involving the ENC
is attempted during the init() call of a servlet which is loaded on startup.

author: remm
msg: - Add additional operations during init and destroy to test bug #1202.

author: remm
msg: - Fix for bug 1219. It makes the URLs generated more unique, to avoid confusing
